__e: The Gestapo is busy. They'll gladly get rid of me.
Gestapo is so busy these days, I'm sure they'll be glad to get rid of me.
The Gestapo has its orders, and anyone who interferes with us can find the results very chilling.
Gestapo comes into camp, love goes out the window.... or in this case, the door.
Gestapo been around? Maybe they found it.
I would do it myself, Colonel, but I'm afraid the Gestapo is following me.
